sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { Container, Row, Section } from "../../../styles/styles"; import Title from '../../../features/title/Title'; import { isCatalogueTitle } from '../../../data/TitleData'; import { FooterData } from "../../../data/FooterData"; import Footer from "../../../features/footer/Footer" import { Content, BlockLeft, BlockRight } from "./BasketElement" import { connect } from "react-redux" import { addToCart, removeFromCart } from "../../../features/actions/cartAction" const Basket = (props) =>{ const { cartItems } = props; return ( <> <Section> <Container> <Row> { cartItems.length === 0 ? (<p>Le panier est vide</p>) : '' } {cartItems.length > 0 ? ( <Content> <BlockLeft> <div className="flex"> <div className="image"> <img src={`http://localhost:8000/images/ZERProBestC1SC1Rec.jpg`} alt=""/> </div> <div className=""> <h5>Titre</h5> </div> <div className="quantity"> <label>1</label> </div> <div className="price"> <strong> Fcfa<br/> € </strong> </div> </div> </BlockLeft> <BlockRight> <div> <div className="titre">Détails de l'achat</div> <div className="table"> <div className="tr"> <div className="td">Prix</div> <div className="td">100388388 Fcfa</div> </div> <div className="tr last"> <div className="td">Total</div> <div className="td">1003883889999 Fcfa</div> </div> </div> </div> </BlockRight> </Content> ) : '' } </Row> </Container> </Section> <Footer footerData = {FooterData}/> </> ) } const mapStateToProps = props =>({ cartItems: props.items }); export default connect(mapStateToProps, { addToCart, removeFromCart })(Basket);
